data.title: Burt Reynolds, Loni Anderson divorce saga continues, 21 years later
authors: Vicki Hyman | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
data.meta_description: Burt Reynolds and Loni Anderson, of the golden couples of the 1980s (and now in their golden years), are still squabbling over their 1993 divorce — specifically, the $97,000 plus interest he allegedly owes her, TMZ.com reports. The couple dated...
data.text:
loni-burt.jpg

Loni Anderson claims Burt Reynolds never paid her the full amount he owes after their nasty '90s divorce.

(Reynolds, AP file photo/Anderson, Getty Images)

Burt Reynolds and Loni Anderson, of the golden couples of the 1980s (and now in their golden years), are still squabbling over their 1993 divorce — specifically, the $97,000 plus interest he allegedly owes her, TMZ.com reports.

The couple dated for five years and were married for another five before an acrimonious divorce and custody battle over their son Quinton.

Reynolds agreed to pay her $234,794 in their split, but the "Smokey and the Bandit" star and sex symbol, who filed for bankruptcy in 1996 and whose Florida estate was foreclosed upon in 2011, never paid her $97,000, which, with interest, is now $154,521, claims the "WKRP in Cincinnati" star in court papers.

FOLLOW STAR-LEDGER ENTERTAINMENT: TWITTER • FACEBOOK
